startScreenOptions.title: Interactive Video
startScreenOptions.shortStartDescription: Press the buttons that appear during the video!

summary: The smoothie ingredients are blueberries, strawberries, oatmeal cookies and milk.
The smoothie ingredients are blackberries, raspberries, oreos and cream.
The smoothie ingredients are blueberries, raspberries, shortbread and yoghurt.
First add the berries, then add the cookies and finally the milk.
First add the cookies, then add the milk and finally the berries.
First add the milk, then add the berries and finally the cookies.
Use a couple of berries to decorate the top of the smoothie glass.
Use cookie crumbles to decorate the top of the smoothie glass.
Use a tiny paper umbrella to decorate the top of the smoothie glass.

l10n.requiresCompletionWarning: You need to answer all the questions correctly before continuing.
l10n.endcardInformation: You have answered @answered questions, click below to submit your answers.
l10n.endcardInformationNoAnswers: You have not answered any questions.
l10n.endcardInformationMustHaveAnswer: You have to answer at least one question before you can submit your answers.
l10n.endCardTableRowSummaryWithScore: You got @score out of @total points for the @question that appeared after @minutes minutes and @seconds seconds.
l10n.endCardTableRowSummaryWithoutScore: You have answered the @question that appeared after @minutes minutes and @seconds seconds.
